name: Aerodangle
description:
Airplanes are a very convenient means of transportation, but not if you are outside of it.
However, the presence of a grappling hook can easily eliminate this disadvantage.
You have to go through a variety of levels, clinging to planes falling apart in the air, using a grappling hook and various abilities.

Explosions, flying, a sense of speed, and a veeery long grappling hook are waiting for you in Aerodangle!
